roleset.name: mix, combine
roleset.note: AMALGAMATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-1-1, mix-22.1-1-1. (from amalgamate.01-v)

AMALGAMATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1& 2. Maps to verb amalgamate.01, which is member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-1-1, mix-22.1-1-1. Noun has no FN entry. (from amalgamation.01-n)

example.name: big verb, little example
example.text: Northgate Exploration Ltd. said [it]*-1 is proposing [*-1]to amalgamate four of its associated companies.

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: The Scots themselves are an amalgamation of different peoples , Picts , Britons , Gaels , Norse and even Anglo - Saxons .
example.arg: of different peoples, Picts , Britons , Gaels , Norse and even Anglo - Saxons .

example.name: Both args
example.text: The women of Luscious Jackson hope that this time around, the time is right for their amalgamation of pop sounds.
